description:
Komi wakes up to find that it snowed overnight. With Tadano and Najimi, she goes out into the fresh snow to start building a snowman.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just a Snowman. / It`s Just a Snowball Fight. / It`s Just the End of the Year. / It`s Just New Year`s.
Yukidaruma Desu. / Yukigassen Desu. / Nenmatsu Desu. / Gantan Desu.
雪だるまです. / 雪合戦です. / 年末です. / 元旦です.
